pageTitle: Session Matrix : Transmission and Driveline (Part 6 of 7): Driveline Modeling
textBeforeTable: Thursday, April 10 Transmission and Driveline (Part 6 of 7): Driveline Modeling (Session Code: PFL680) Room 357  8:00 a.m. This session covers transmission and driveline modeling, including topics related to transmission hardware, software, and system integration. Organizers - Rakan Chabaan, Gang Chen, John C. Collins, Chrysler Group LLC; Patrick Robert Darmstadt, Boeing Helicopters; Hussein Dourra, Chrysler Group LLC; Fabio Ferreira, Schaeffler Brasil, Ltd.; Michael E. Fingerman, John A. Frait, Chrysler Group LLC; Joel Gunderson, James Hendrickson, Chunhao Lee, Dongxu Li, General Motors Co.; Berthold Martin, Chrysler Group LLC; Thomas Martin, General Motors Co.; David Popejoy, Craig Renneker, Ford Motor Co.; Farzad Samie, General Motors Co.; Brian Carl Schneidewind, Toyota Technical Center USA Inc.; Tejinder Singh, General Motors Co.; Robert A. Smithson, Dana Holding Corporation; Erich L. Wilfinger, Jatco USA Inc.
